org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.json

Class JSONParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.json.JSONParser

  • public class JSONParser
extends Object
    A JSONParser contains a JSONObject and provides opportunity to access embedded fields in JSON code.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JSONParser(String jsonText)
      Construct a JSONParser from a string.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.apache.sling.commons.json.JSONObject parse(String key)
      Parse the JSON code passed to the constructor to find the given key.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • JSONParser

        public JSONParser(String jsonText)
           throws org.apache.sling.commons.json.JSONException
        Construct a JSONParser from a string. The string has to be a JSON code from which we want to get a field.
        Parameters:
        jsonText - A string which contains a JSON code. String representation of a JSON code.
        Throws:
        org.apache.sling.commons.json.JSONException - If there is a syntax error in the source string.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public org.apache.sling.commons.json.JSONObject parse(String key)
                                               throws org.apache.sling.commons.json.JSONException
        Parse the JSON code passed to the constructor to find the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - The key whose value is searched for.
        Returns:
        A JSONObject which has only one field called "retValue" and the value associated to it is the searched value. The methods of JSONObject can be used to get the field value in a desired format.
        Throws:
        org.apache.sling.commons.json.JSONException - If the key is not found.
